title: Technical Specialist
description: Working on various Agile projects, all focused on full-stack web application development for enterprise applications, using technologies like ASP.NET, ASP.NET Core, Node.js, Knockout and Vue.

title: Graduate Technical Specialist
description: Completed graduate training and began working on projects in the Microsoft tech stack, using ASP.NET and SQL Server.

title: Technical Specialist - Industrial Placement
description: As part of my degree, I opted to undertake a year-long industrial placement. After an initial training period, I was introduced to development in the Microsoft tech-stack, including ASP.NET and SQL Server.
